FOUND IN: Hydrogen Bomb (H-bomb, thermonuclear weapon whose design was first tested by the United States in 1952).
Elevate (can refer to both raising in position and the literal act of stepping on rungs)
Cheers - Shouts of encouragement or celebration.
Sinister (adj.) – giving the impression that something harmful will happen, suggesting wickedness or evil
Oxford – Refers to a prestigious dark blue university known for its storied history.
Rash (Conveys a sense of acting quickly without careful thought, in line with the etymology)
Backlash (strong negative reaction to something, often violent in nature)
